io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.navigator

Class ActivityBindingNavigator

  • io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.navigator.ActivityBindingNavigator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Navigator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NodeNavigator

    public class ActivityBindingNavigator
implements Navigator

    Navigator which binds to Activity to make sure that navigation events are delivered between Activity configuration changes.

    Note that you have to override io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.navigator.ActivityBindingNavigator$navigate(android.app.Activity,java.lang.Object) instead of io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.navigator.ActivityBindingNavigator$navigate(java.lang.Object).

    See Also:
    Activity, Activity, io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.navigator.ActivityBindingNavigator$navigate(android.app.Activity,java.lang.Object), io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.navigator.ActivityBindingNavigator$navigate(java.lang.Object)

    • Method Detail

      • bind

        public void bind(android.app.Activity activity)

        Binds Activity to this navigator.

        See Also:
        Activity

      • unbind

        public void unbind()

        Unbinds Activity from this navigator.

        See Also:
        Activity

      • navigate

        public void navigate(java.lang.Object data)

        Calls io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.navigator.ActivityBindingNavigator$navigate(android.app.Activity,java.lang.Object) method of child class

        See Also:
        io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.navigator.ActivityBindingNavigator$navigate(android.app.Activity,java.lang.Object)

      • navigate

        protected void navigate(android.app.Activity activity,
                        java.lang.Object data)

        Called instead of io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.navigator.ActivityBindingNavigator$navigate(java.lang.Object) when Activity is bound.

        See Also:
        io.scanbot.sdk.ui.utils.navigator.ActivityBindingNavigator$navigate(java.lang.Object), Activity

      • getActivity

        protected android.app.Activity getActivity()
        Returns:
        org.jetbrains.dokka.NodeRenderContent@66fc6477: associated Activity or null.
